item.title: CyberWorld 2021年路线图
item.description: 官方博客：https://blog.cybermiles.io/categories/zh/ 微博：CyberMiles中文社区 小助手微信：C

item.title: Roadmap 2021 for CyberMiles NFT Platform CyberWorld
item.description: CyberMiles NFT Platform, CyberWorld, has been officially launched in April together with Sino Global in April 2021 ahead of schedule. CyberWorld Version 1.0 attracted great attention from 120, 000, users in the community. Along with the launch, CyberWorld Genesis NFTs were minted and released. CyberWorld Version 2.0 is under development right now. In August, the CyberWorld NFT platform can be accessed with CyberMiles App on the mobile phone. CyberWorld will migrate from BSC blockchain to CyberMiles mainnet.
